To: 'iryna1978@hotmail.com' <iryna1978@hotmail.com <mailto:iryna1978@hotmail.com> >; 'uaeleasing@chalhoub.com' <uaeleasing@chalhoub.com <mailto:uaeleasing@chalhoub.com> >; 'Hajar.Agaeva@chalhoub.com' <Hajar.Agaeva@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hajar.Agaeva@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Request for Documents - L'occitane

 

Dear L'occitane Team,

 

I Hope you are doing amazing.

 

I wanted to introduce myself to you as I have recently joined Bawabat Al-Sharq Mall as a Leasing Executive. I'm very excited to be a part of this journey and to be a part of the team.

 

To ensure we are providing you with the best service, kindly take a moment to help us update your information in our system and provide us with the following Document:

 

*	Property Insurance

 

Please check and provide us with the required at your earliest convenience, and please let me know if you have any questions regarding the same.

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Alanoud Jarrar

Leasing Executive
